value:
$nMPID_エイリーク|I don't care for fighting. There's too
much blood and pain... Why are
adults drawn to such things?

$nMPID_エイリーク|Renais has many strong warriors...
Orson, Seth—oh, and Father! You'll
be strong too, Ephraim! I know it!

$nMPID_エフラム|I told you to stay behind, but you
clung to my side. Don't cry to me
if something happens to you!

$nMPID_エフラム|I'm prince of Renais, so I must grow
strong so I can lead our armies
and protect our people!

$nMPID_エフラム|The two finalists of the youth bracket
of the tournament the other day were
amazing... I must keep training.

$nMPID_エイリーク|I am Eirika. I've come to greet you
as princess of Renais!$k$pEphraim, you're supposed to offer
your greeting too!

$nMPID_エイリーク|I'm the princess of Renais, country of
brave knights! I can't simply stand by
while we're under threat of attack!

$nMPID_エイリーク|Are you all right, Brother?! You insist
on rushing ahead... I worry about you!

$nMPID_エフラム|Are you hurt, Eirika?! As long as you
are free from harm, all is well.

$nMPID_エフラム|This is possible? I had no idea. I must
learn more about this world! Ah, but
the lecture can wait until...later.

My name is Eirika. This is my brother,
Ephraim. We're twins! That's why
we're always together.

$nMPID_エフラム|A world where you can focus on the
martial training, free from obligations
of nobility...$k$pThis is how a world should be! I'm
glad I was able to leave the palace
behind to come here.$k$p$nMPID_エイリーク|Brother... If we don't get home soon,
Father will worry!$k$p$nMPID_エフラム|I must grow stronger if I'm to protect
our kingdom. The complicated stuff
is your responsibility if you ask me...$k$p$nMPID_エイリーク|Well, if you ask ME, it's upsetting
that you'd think of leaving me behind
just to go on a journey to train!$k$p$nMPID_エフラム|Fine, fine. It was selfish of me... You
can stop giving me that look now.$k$p$nMPID_エイリーク|Ephraim, you worry me, going out
and getting into battles.$k$p$nMPID_エフラム|It'll be fine! Listen, I'll get stronger
and stronger, and then you won't
have to worry!$k$pAnd I'll always be there to protect
you too. You can count on that!$k$p$nMPID_エイリーク|...You promise? All right. As long as
you stay near so I can always keep
my eye on you too.
たあっ
そこです！
ああっ
いやぁっ…
くそう…
$nMPID_二人|For Renais!
$nMPID_二人|Ephraim! We can handle this!
$nMPID_エイリーク|I'm ready to go!
$nMPID_エフラム|I'm with you!
Ephraim... Where'd you go?
Don't strain yourself.
Give it all you've got!
"Can we manage?" "Never doubt it!"
"Put your faith in me, Eirika." "Always, Ephraim!"
Yes.
"Together, we're unstoppable." "Definitely!"
Hmm...
I'll give it my all.
Stay close to me.
$nMPID_エイリーク|Ephraim! Are you all right?!
$nMPID_エフラム|I'm fine, Eirika. It's only a scratch.
$nMPID_エイリーク|It's my fault you're hurt. I'm so sorry!

$nMPID_エフラム|It's OK. Everyone trips now and then.
If I hadn't intervened, you could
have rolled right off that cliff.

A few scrapes and bruises are a small
price to pay to keep you from getting
far worse. Easy choice.

$nMPID_エイリーク|Even so...I put the future
king of Renais in danger.

If something happened to you, the
whole kingdom would be lost. Your
safety is so much more important...
$nMPID_エフラム|That's not true, Eirika.
$nMPID_エイリーク|But...

$nMPID_エフラム|Whether I'm to be king or not
makes no difference. My life is
not worth any more than yours.

No matter what, I am your brother,
and I will always protect you.
Do you understand?
$nMPID_エイリーク|Yes, Ephraim. I do.

$nMPID_エフラム|Good. Then let's return to the castle.
We're in for a scolding, I'm sure.

$nMPID_エイリーク|I'm bound to get an earful over
your scratches, aren't I?
$nMPID_エフラム|Relax. I've got your back.

$nMPID_エイリーク|In that case, even the harshest words
won't faze me. Together, we can
handle anything!

$nMPID_エフラム|There's the sister I know and love!
Off we go, then.
